import { React, useState } from 'react'; import './Modal.css'; export default function Modal({ open, onClose }) { let [authMode, setAuthMode] = useState("Sign In"); const changeAuthMode = () => { setAuthMode(authMode === "Sign In" ? "Sign Up" : "Sign In"); } let [isLoggedIn, setIsLoggedIn] = useState(false); const handleLogin = (event) => { event.preventDefault(); // prevent default form submission behavior setIsLoggedIn(true); // set isLoggedIn to true } if (!open) return null; return (
{ isLoggedIn === false ? ( <>
